summary: Changes load screens to something more Sheogorath
descriptionHtml:
[size=+2][color=Red][b]Due to not enough time and possible making of a few other mods, this mod will be put on hold and no further updates will be made.[/b][/color][/size]

[size=+2][color=Red][b]What Is This?[/b][/color][/size]

Well its a revamp of 
UNCLE SHEOGORATH\'S REALLY HELPFUL HINTS AND TIPS by Tumbleworld.
With his permission I have revamped some of the load screens.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]What Have You Done?[/b][/color][/size]

* All 299-ish of the original loading screen have been reworked to something more Sheogorath like.
* I have not added in entirely new tips. Well, maybe just one or two. 
* I have not changed the screen images associated with the tips.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Why?[/b][/color][/size]

Normal load screens got very boring very quickly, and I loved tumbleworlds but wanted to change and add new ones.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Will You Be Adding Any DLC\'s Or Mods?[/b][/color][/size]

All current DLCS (Dawnguard, Hearthfires, Dragonborn) are all in the works of being revamped.
Mods depending one the demand

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Thanks To:[/b][/color][/size]

tumbleworld
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/470889
for allowing me to rework his mod, and more amazing work which he made.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Updates?[/b][/color][/size]

A new update when I complete each version or if someone finds any mistakes I have missed I\'ll fix them.

[size=+4][color=Yellow][b]My Other Mods[/b][/color][/size]
Forties Sheogorath Dawnguard Load Screens
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32305
Forties Alchemy Shack 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30448
Forties A Nords Dos And Donts Of Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32771
author: Fortie-Tumbleworld
